item.title: Using jsconfig for faster nextjs development
item.description: I spend a lot of time in NextJS projects, my whole YouTube channel is built around it. One small change to my workflow is adding a jsconfig.json file to each project.

item.title: Why I removed analytics and and ended up with NextJs
item.description: I’ve heard and seen a lot of “What language should I pick first?” Questions in my time as a developer. It’s an interesting question that I seem to have the opposite response to most.

item.title: Why flag parameters suck
item.description: When coding people tend to use flag parameters to drive their functions, without considering that they absolutely suck! They cause more trouble when a you write complex functions or a codebase that is large in nature, because the readability is just terrible let me explain.

item.title: Why I removed analytics and and ended up with NextJs
item.description: On a early Saturday morning of my first day of Staycation I decided to fix my blog performance and usability.I first decided its time to get rid of analytics, advertisements and other shit that no one really needs

item.title: Why you don't need to be a mathematics genius to be a developer.
item.description: When you first start thinking about becoming a developer, one of the things you might hear is you need to be a math(s) wizz. I am here to tell you that a small number of developers need the mathematics outside of algebra.

item.title: NextJS + FaunaDB Crash Course
item.description: Welcome to my latest blog post, which is a crash course on NextJS and Fauna, in this blog post I am going to show you how to Create a Database, Read from that database and finally update the collection.
